item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Gamble everything for love, if you're a true human being." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "There is little one can say about love. It has to be lived, and it's always in motion." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "You have to keep breaking your heart until it opens." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "If you want to be more alive, love is the truest health." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Your longing for ME is my message to you, All your attempts to reach ME, Are in reality MY attempts to reach you." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Love is a river. Drink from it." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Wherever you are, and whatever you do, be in love." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "My lips got lost on the way to the kiss - that's how drunk I was." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "What you seek is seeking you." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "In Silence there is eloquence. Stop weaving and see how the pattern improves." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "On a day when the wind is perfect, the sail just needs to open and the world is full of beauty. Today is such a day." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "There are lovers content with longing. Iâ€™m not one of them." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Love calls - everywhere and always. We're sky bound. Are you coming?" -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "This is how I would die into the love I have for you: As pieces of cloud dissolve in sunlight." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "I want your sun to reach my raindrops, so your heat can raise my soul upward like a cloud." -- Rumi

item.title: Jennifer add a quote by Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
item.description: "Be quiet now and wait. It may be that the ocean one, the one we desire so to move into and become, desires us out here on land a little longer, going our sundry roads to the shore." -- Mawlana Jalal-al-Din Rumi
